snippet: Viewing of the 40-year-old cult film “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” continues to evolve, with a “silent” screening in Damrosch Park.
abstract: Around 2,000 people attend 'silent' screening of cult classic movie The Rocky Horror Picture Show as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors festival; audio of film is delivered by wireless headphones to audience members, who may sing and act along with characters on screen and on stage.
lead_paragraph: Viewing of the 40-year-old cult film “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” continues to evolve, with a “silent” screening in Damrosch Park.

headline.main: ‘Rocky Horror’ at Lincoln Center, With Headphones
headline.print_headline: Doing the Time Warp With Headphones

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival
